text: Smartenit sells a Zigbee motion sensor <http://smartenit.com/product/zbms3/>

attachments.title: ZBMS3 – Model #1019C
attachments.text: Wireless ZigBee HA Motion Detector With Light Sensor Your home control system becomes more intelligent the more data from the real world you can feed it.  ZBMS3 really smartens up your system by providing information on motion, temperature, and ambient light that can then be used to influence other devices.  Easily trigger devices such as lights or alarms based on motion, with this perfect addition to your security or energy management system. Smart Possibilities: Automatically trigger on/ off devices like light controls when motion is detected Receive reports on your phone, tablet, or web browser when unexpected motion is detected in your system while you're out Turn on lights when driving into the garage so you don't have to enter a dark house Trigger lights on/ off based on ambient light levels
